description.p1: Web Developer since 2010, trained for any type of web development or web application, specialized in Frontend, I have developed hundreds of websites using CMS, Framework and pure code, as well as code libraries, among others.
description.p2: I am one of those people who love challenges, capable of facing a new challenge every day and overcoming them, I like to innovate, that is why my professional career, which I have learned through practice, being able to work with such wonderful people from all over the world.

about.downloadAlt: Download Curriculum Vitae and Cover Letter

service1.title: Web design
service1.desp: Websites, Corporate Sites, Custom Made, Online Stores, Blog Sites, News, Forums and more to highlight the potential of your company, business or venture and grow your brand.

service2.title: Code Development
service2.desp: Do you need exclusive functions for your website, or develop an exclusive website? I offer you the best code development service that best suits your needs.

service3.title: Redesign and Maintenance
service3.desp: I modernize your website, to obtain better results and I have the best maintenance plans on the market to keep the face of your company or business (your website) optimized, updated, clean, secure and modern.

service4.title: Web Translation
service4.desp: You need to reach more people in the world, don't worry! I translate your website in many languages, English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, German, Mandarin and much, many more...

service5.title: Advice
service5.desp: You want to migrate your business to the cloud, I offer you help and advice to start your online business and this service is completely FREE. I will not charge you to be by your side in your first steps.

service6.title: Technical SEO
service6.desp: I improve your website, to achieve a better positioning in the main search engines and thus increase visits to your website, sell more products or make yourself known.
